data.advanced-apis#Advanced APIs: Smart Contract API - Deploy and interact with smart contracts Analytics API - Access transaction analytics and reports Webhook API - Configure and manage webhooks
data.api-reference#API Reference: API ReferenceComplete API reference for BigLedger services.
data.core-apis#Core APIs: Transaction API - Create, query, and manage transactions Account API - Account management and authentication Wallet API - Wallet operations and balance queries

data.developer-documentation#Developer Docume: Developer DocumentationTechnical documentation for developers integrating with BigLedger.
data.overview#Overview: This section provides comprehensive technical documentation for developers building on the BigLedger platform.
data.topics#Topics: SDK Installation API Integration Smart Contract Development Security Considerations Best Practices Code Examples

data: Guide for installing and configuring BigLedger SDK.
data.configuration#Configuration:
Create a configuration file:
// config.js module.exports = { apiKey: 'YOUR_API_KEY', network: 'mainnet', // or 'testnet' timeout: 30000 };
data.system-requirements#System Requirements: Node.js 16+ or Python 3.8+ 4GB RAM minimum 10GB free disk space
data.troubleshooting#Troubleshooting:
Common issues and solutions:
Connection errors: Check your API key and network settings Version conflicts: Ensure you’re using compatible versions Permission issues: Verify your account has the necessary permissions
data.verification#Verification:
Verify your installation:
const BigLedger = require('@bigledger/sdk'); const client = new BigLedger({ apiKey: 'YOUR_API_KEY' }); client.getStatus().then(console.log);

data.search-tips#Search Tips: Use keywords from the topic you’re looking for Search is case-insensitive Press Ctrl+K (or Cmd+K on Mac) to quickly focus the search box Press Escape to clear the search

data.advanced#Advanced: Smart Contract Development Performance Optimization Security Best Practices

data.overview#Overview: This user guide covers everything you need to know to use BigLedger effectively, from basic concepts to advanced features.
data.topics-covered#Topics Covered: Getting started with BigLedger Account management Transaction handling Security best practices Advanced features Troubleshooting
data.user-guide#User Guide: User GuideComplete guide for BigLedger end users. Learn how to use all features effectively.

data: Welcome to BigLedger! This guide will help you get started quickly.
data.1-account-setup#1. Account Setup:
Create your BigLedger account:
Visit BigLedger Platform Click “Sign Up” Follow the registration process Verify your email
data.2-dashboard-overview#2. Dashboard Overvi:
After logging in, you’ll see the main dashboard with:
Account overview Recent transactions Quick actions Notifications
data.3-basic-operations#3. Basic Operations:
Learn the fundamental operations:
Creating transactions Viewing history Managing settings
data.next-steps#Next Steps: Explore more User Guides Check out Developer Documentation Review API Reference
data.prerequisites#Prerequisites:
Before you begin, ensure you have:
An active BigLedger account Basic understanding of blockchain concepts Internet connection
